definition.text: The Larry Williams as explained in his book "Trade Stocks and Commodities with the Insiders: Secrets of the COT Report". It is an inverse oscillator that attempts to identify trend reversals.

paragraphs.text: Since this indicator is an inverse indicator, potential entry points are found when the oscillator goes below zero from above, and sell indications when the oscillator rises above zero.
The indicator can also be used to spot divergences with the price action, therefore signalling a potential reversal.
The following properties are available to access:

| Product Name | Product Variable | Properties |
| LWProxy | lwp | value |
The parameters of the indicator's calculations can be changed by locating and opening the Javascript Code under Data Building Procedure -> Procedure Loop under "LW Proxy" Procedure Loop.
